instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1502: What is A1502? A1502 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2014, Late 2013, Early 2015 with EMC 2875, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3476, 820-3536, 820-4924..

threads.title: Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> retina issue bios or something else
threads.message: Hi it was bios corrupted and after replace MacBook works but showing only 4gb memory instead 8gb and in settings don't recognize mouse or trackpad even if they working

threads.title: Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> retina issue bios or something else
threads.message: Used the wrong BIOS from 3536 board...Also you will need clean ME region. Upload original dump.

threads.title: Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> retina issue bios or something else
threads.message: Don't have bios reader for mac ,i order that from eBay ,<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid 2014 ,EMC 2875,serial c02n246jg3qj

threads.title: Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> retina issue bios or something else
threads.message: You cannot order chips from Ebay as they will probably have a used ME region. Go buy a TL866 first.
